IRCDaemon.name: Psylance Client Admin IRC Channel
IRCDaemon.post: the thing about anime is that it's a medium with near limitless creative potential
but every year, we get the same generic "in another world" series featuring a self-insert protagonist and his harem of girls
are you really going to talk about this here...?
now listen here you fucking weeb
good, I have your attention now.
you weren't even gonna add to the conversation?
I kinda need the link to the logs server
you remember how sometime last year we were... silenced?
yeah, the good ol' government's asking for logs on everyone involved in the incident.
